00020 template <class T>
00021 class llist                     //The llist class
00022         {
00023         node <T> *start,*curr,*temp;
00024         int length;
00025         public:
00026         llist()
00027                 {
00028                 start = NULL;

00030                 }

00051         template < class T>
00052         int llist<T>::killall()        //For killing
00053                 {
00054                         dog("********************** D ************* ");
00055                                 char buf[80];
00056                                 sprintf(buf,"The current Heap size is %ld",heapsize());
00057                         
00058                         dog("Befro new windows ");
00059                         dog(buf);
00060                 temp = start;
00061                 node <T> * killer;
00062                 while(temp)
00063                                    {
00064                                  
00065                                    killer=temp;
00066                                    temp=temp->next;
00067                                   //if(killer->data)
00068                                    free(killer->data);
00069                                    free(killer);
00070                                    }
00071                                    
00072                                 sprintf(buf,"The current Heap size is %ld",heapsize());
00073                         
00074                         dog("after new windows ");
00075                         dog(buf);
00076                 length=0;
00077                 start=NULL;
00078                 return 1;
00079                 } // end of killer()

00084         template < class T>
00085         void llist<T>::insert(T item)        //For pushing
00086                 {
00087                 temp=(node <T> *)malloc(sizeof(node<T>)) ;
00088                 if(temp != NULL)
00089                 {
00090                         length ++;
00091                         temp->data=item;
00092                         temp->next=start;
00093                         start=temp;
00094 
00095                 }  // End of checking NULL
00096 
00097                 }
00098                   // End of Function

00104         template <class T>
00105         int llist<T>::remove(int pos=-1)           //For poping
00106                 {
00107                 if(pos > length)
00108                         {
00109                         cerr<<" Invalid Postion in remove () : llist.h ";
00110                         dog(" Invalid Postion in remove() : llist.h ");
00111                         exit(0);
00112                         }
00113                 int i=1;
00114                 node <T> * prev=start;
00115                 if(pos == -1 ) pos =length;
00116                 temp=start;
00117                 while(i != pos)
00118                         {
00119                         //cout<<"d"<<pos << " "<<i;
00120                         prev=temp;
00121                         temp=temp->next;
00122                         i++;
00123                         }
00124                 length --;
00125                 if(temp == start)
00126                         {
00127                         start=start->next;
00128                         }
00129                 else
00130                         {
00131                         prev->next=temp->next;
00132                         }
00133 
00134                //       curr=prev;
00135                 free(temp->data);
00136                 free(temp);
00137                 }

00140         template <class T>
00141         int llist<T>::remove(T item)           //For poping
00142                 {
00143                 int i=1;
00144                 int done =false;
00145                 temp=start;
00146                 while(i <=length && ! done)
00147                         {
00148                         if(temp->data == item)
00149                                 {
00150                                 remove(i);              
00151                                 done=true;
00152                                 }
00153                         temp=temp->next;
00154                         i++;
00155                         }
00156                 if(!done)
00157                         dog(" Item Not Found in remove(T) : llist.h");  
00158                 
00159                 }

00163                 {
00164                 return curr->data;

00171                 return 1;

00187         T llist<T>::getitem(int pos)    // gettin item 's' from 0 to ....
00188                 {
00189                 if(pos > length)
00190                         return 0;
00191                         
00192                         int i=1;

00194                 temp=start;

00196                         {
00197                         //cout<<"d"<<pos << " "<<i;
